Surroundings otherwise Here is how to take part in the Entourage project, if there are no events or actions in your area: Make a financial donation to\nEntourage Become a reporter for\nEntourage Talking about Entourage Become an Ambassador LinkedOut program I help Entourage differently I change my area of ​​action It\'s pretty quiet here Search\nfurther
To help with the future deployment of Entourage in your area, be our eyes and ears! Share with us what you observe in your environment.\n\nThis questionnaire covers different themes, answer as many as you can. If the situation changes, you can fill it out again to keep us informed.\n\nYour collaboration is invaluable, we thank you warmly! Entourage reporters Participate

Welcome to the \nsocial network, really social For many, the street is a place of passage.\nFor some, it is daily life.\nSo to start, meet those who experience it every day. Find our awareness contentici
It\'s time to get started! A social network is better together!\nIntroduce yourself to %s A social network is better together!\nIntroduce yourself to your group %s Introduce yourself to your group of neighbors A few tips for getting to know each other: Give your first name, your city Talk about your passions Highlight your needs and desires Need inspiration? Say hello to my neighbors Hello Parisian neighbours. My name is Eric and I look forward to meeting you around the entourage network events.
Up to you How about a little quiz to deconstruct prejudices about the street world? In your opinion, what percentage of homeless people have a mobile phone? Start the quiz
Already 10 days: welcome to the family! It\'s crazy how time flies when you\'re in good company.\n\nNow help us grow the Entourage network: bring yours! Share app
Discover the events 6000 people made new friends at an Entourage event Help your neighbors No help around you? Create it! Find the event that interests you and come and enjoy a friendly moment. Take a look at the published requests near you: A good way to create a link between neighbors is to share your interests, your passions or just a coffee to get to know each other. Talk over a coffee Donation of women\'s clothing 10m from me Paris (75010) June 21, 2022 at 12 p.m. Discover the events Discover the requests Create a contribution "Discover the Entourage app, the truly social social network"

Introduce yourself to network members Good morning ! I have just joined the network and would like to meet caring neighbours. To fill in your description, access your profile from the <font color="#ec4e1a">profile</font> button at the bottom right
Explore the initiatives around youentourages See the actions created by your neighbors and <font color="#ec4e1a">join the ones that interest you from the map</font>
Dare to meet homeless people <font colour="#ec4e1a">Discover the practical advice</font> of the guide <font colour="#ec4e1a">Simple Comme Bonjour</font> from the profile at the bottom right
Launch a solidarity action Call on your neighbors to surround a homeless person. <font color="#ec4e1a">Create an action with the button:</font>
The rule Group rules, please read carefully. Attitude The exchanges in the groups must be done with respect, trust and mutual aid between the members so that everyone can feel safe and in a warm environment. It is therefore not permitted to make degrading, aggressive, insulting, discriminatory, insistent, intolerant or defamatory remarks. Trade Groups are spaces for exchange and mutual aid between neighbours, advertising is therefore prohibited, as are proposals for purchase, sale or rental. Jackpot In general, there is no financial relationship between the members of the groups, pots are prohibited. Topics Benevolent free expression is the rule on groups. However, to respect the apolitical and secular character of Entourage and for the protection of people, subjects relating to politics, religion, medicine or sexuality are not authorized. Protection of people The publications may not contain any personal data allowing the precise identification and location of a person or any sensitive data on persons (medical, judicial, ethical origin, sexual or political orientation, etc.).
Events Charter Charter of events, to read carefully. be kind I use the application for the purpose of mutual assistance in favor of people in a situation of great precariousness or exclusion. Collect agreement I ensure the consent of the persons concerned before creating an action. Ensuring the protection of people I guarantee not to communicate sensitive personal data (medical, legal…), or allowing to identify or precisely locate people. To be united, without distinction I pledge to make no distinction of race, color, sex, language, religion, political opinion, wealth, birth or any other status.
Code of ethics
mutual aid The application makes it possible to create new meetings between neighbors and to promote times of exchange. Remote assistance (drive, delivery, gift voucher, pot, etc.) is not authorized. Contributions & requests I can request or offer material goods (equipment, clothing, etc.), services (laundry, printing of documents, etc.) and time for sharing (coffee, activity, etc.). I cannot request or offer financial assistance, accommodation or food assistance. But if it is my need, I can contact the moderator who will guide me. Consent When I publish a request for a third party, I make sure to obtain their agreement beforehand. No discrimination I undertake to relate to people without discrimination (race, religion, sexual orientation, political opinion, etc.). Protection of people I guarantee that my actions do not contain any personal data (surname, telephone, precise address, etc.), allowing a person to be identified and precisely located, nor any sensitive data (medical, legal, etc.).

Start date * End date
Audience Private You accept that anyone participates in your event, without checking their profile first. You validate each person individually before confirming that they can participate.
Your action is public, everyone can participate freely. Your action is private, you will have the choice to accept or refuse anyone asking to participate.
Entourage was not created! The event could not be created! Fill in a category for your action Title cannot be empty Choose a date Indicate a location
Ask for help Call on the network Offer help Give a good, time, … Announce an event on a specific date
CATEGORY I LOOK FOR… I PROPOSE TO…
TITLE Example: I am available for administrative assistance for access to housing Actions with a clear title attract more members and are more likely to succeed! Your title must be less than 100 characters. You can tell more in the description. Example: Games night between neighbors with and without home Events with a clear title attract more attendees.
DESCRIPTION Example: I am a former town hall employee and available for administrative assistance for access to housing.\nIf you think you need help, we can meet in a café on the weekends. Tell your story. Actions with a clear description attract more members and are more likely to succeed! Example: Need for volunteers for the national Restos du Cœur collection in our local team You can modify this description and the date of your event at any time.

It seems quiet here!<br/><br/> Move the map to find support structures: solidarity restaurants, public showers, medical centers open to street people...<br/><br/> A structure is missing on the map?<br/> <a href=\'%1$s\'>Suggest structure</a> <br/><br/>The Communal Center for Social Action in your municipality can provide information on all the local associations and social assistance available to residents.
The Solidarity Guide allows you to find out about assistance structures: solidarity restaurants, public showers, medical centers open to people on the street...\n\n As a resident, you can suggest a place to a person on the street, but keep in mind that it is the role of social workers to support each situation.
That\'s all for the solidarity places in this radius around you

Our awareness workshops help you deconstruct prejudices on the street and find answers to your questions. Find a workshop

The social network, really social. Our mission: to mobilize and equip citizens to support the most excluded. On the Entourage app: Meet like-minded neighbors at events and discuss solidarity actions. Entourage with you! Entourage\'s teams of ambassadors, volunteers and moderators support and guide you on a daily basis.

That\'s good ! Entourage is an association at the service of your activities. Surroundings Some great stories that show the value of the Entourage community. Concretely, in the app, features are dedicated to you Be well identified on the network and engage your community A verified profile for each of your members: a pledge of trust for your neighbors A verified profile A page for your structure: to inform locally about your activities and needs. A page for your structure Sending notifications in your neighborhood and beyond to community members.
